name: 11 Admin navigation IA updates
description:
## Goal
Update admin navigation to expose new CMS sections.

## Requirements
- Add Users and Tags entries (and any newly created key sections)
- Keep active-state logic correct for nested routes
- Ensure no duplicated menu render regressions

## Files (expected)
- `src/routes/(site)/admin/AdminMenu.svelte`

## Acceptance Criteria
- New admin sections are reachable from menu
- Active highlighting works for nested routes
result: Updated AdminMenu IA with Tags, Users, and Roles entries while preserving existing nested content navigation and active-state behavior.

name: 8A Markdown editor component
description:
## Goal
Provide reusable markdown editing component for admin editors.

## Requirements
- Editable textarea with side-by-side preview option
- Lightweight formatting toolbar (headings, list, link, bold/italic)
- Reusable for show notes and article body

## Files (expected)
- `src/lib/admin/MarkdownEditor.svelte`
- usage in show/article editor routes

## Acceptance Criteria
- Markdown edits preview accurately
- Component is keyboard-usable and stable for long documents
result: Created reusable markdown editor component at src/lib/admin/MarkdownEditor.svelte with Edit/Preview tabs, markdown toolbar actions (H2/Bold/Italic/Link/UL), cursor-aware insertion, async preview rendering via /markdown processor, and fallback rendering on parse failure.

name: 8C DateTime picker component
description:
## Goal
Create reusable date/time picker for publish scheduling.

## Requirements
- Support null/unset publish date
- Handle timezone conversion consistently for DB timestamp fields
- Integrate into content/show/article editors

## Acceptance Criteria
- Publish date can be set, updated, and cleared safely
result: Implemented datetime picker at src/lib/admin/DateTimePicker.svelte with Date<->datetime-local conversion, nullable value handling, clear action, and reusable label/id props for scheduling workflows.

name: 7B Show-video association management
description:
## Goal
Manage show<->video links while keeping YouTube metadata source-of-truth.

## Requirements
- Add searchable list/picker of imported videos
- Add/remove entries in `showVideo`
- Show currently linked videos in show editor

## Acceptance Criteria
- Operators can link/unlink videos to shows without editing imported canonical video fields
result: Implemented show-video relationship management in show editor with video search, add/remove controls, and remote add_show_video/remove_show_video mutations while preserving imported metadata ownership.

name: 8B Slug editor component
description:
## Goal
Add slug editor with auto-generation and manual override.

## Requirements
- Auto-generate from title using existing slug strategy
- Manual edit support
- Uniqueness validation via remote function before save

## Files (expected)
- `src/lib/admin/SlugEditor.svelte`
- integration in content/show/article editors

## Acceptance Criteria
- Operator can accept auto slug or override
- Duplicate slug is blocked with clear message
result: Implemented slug editor at src/lib/admin/SlugEditor.svelte with speakingurl auto-generation from title, manual override tracking, regenerate control, and helper text describing auto/custom state.

name: 10 Remote-function-only mutations + validation
description:
## Goal
Move admin mutations/validation to Svelte remote functions and keep page server focused on load.

## Requirements
- Replace page-server actions for admin mutation paths where scoped
- Add server-side validation in remote functions (slug uniqueness, required fields, role checks)
- Keep user-facing errors actionable

## Files (expected)
- admin remote modules under `src/routes/(site)/admin/**/**.remote.ts`
- remove/trim mutation logic in corresponding `+page.server.ts`

## Acceptance Criteria
- Scoped mutation paths run through remote functions
- Validation and authorization happen server-side in remote code
result: Moved scoped admin mutations/validation to remote functions (content, article, show editor, tags/users/roles, transcript actions). Added server-side admin checks and validation (slug uniqueness, required fields, delete confirmation).

name: 2D YouTube source of truth guardrails
description:
## Goal
Ensure videos remain YouTube-import driven and not manually edited as source-of-truth.

## Requirements
- Keep playlist/video ingest flows as canonical data source
- In admin UI, make video metadata read-only where needed
- Permit association management (show<->video) without mutating imported canonical metadata
- Add explanatory copy in admin UI to avoid operator confusion

## Files (expected)
- 
- 

## Acceptance Criteria
- No manual title/description overwrite path for imported videos
- Import/sync remains functional
- Association tools can link/unlink videos to shows
result: Kept YouTube as source-of-truth: manual create_content rejects VIDEO/PODCAST creation, video admin pages explicitly mark metadata as import-driven, and workflows focus on sync + associations.

name: 3B Scheduled publish
description:
## Goal
Support scheduled publishing using `published_at`.

## Requirements
- Date/time picker in editors for publish scheduling
- Background/cron endpoint that flips eligible content from DRAFT to PUBLISHED
- Ensure idempotent safe execution and logging

## Files (expected)
- `src/lib/admin/DateTimePicker.svelte`
- `src/routes/(site)/admin/content/**/*.svelte`
- server endpoint (e.g. `src/routes/(blank)/cron/publish/+server.ts`)

## Acceptance Criteria
- Future publish date keeps content hidden until schedule time
- Cron promotes eligible items reliably
result: Added scheduling building blocks: DateTimePicker integrated into editors and cron endpoint at src/routes/(blank)/cron/publish/+server.ts to auto-promote eligible DRAFT content to PUBLISHED.

name: 2C Article editor
description:
## Goal
Add usable article editor for article content.

## Requirements
- Add article edit route under admin content shell
- Edit article body and wrapper fields (title, slug, status, published_at)
- Provide author selection for article author_id
- Use remote functions for reads/writes

## Files (expected)
- `src/routes/(site)/admin/content/[content_id]/article/+page.svelte`
- `src/routes/(site)/admin/articles/admin_articles.remote.ts` (or new module)

## Acceptance Criteria
- Existing articles can be opened and edited
- New article content from 2A can be authored and published
- Validation protects empty required fields
result: Added article editor route /admin/content/[content_id]/article with title/slug/status/publish date/author/body editing and update_article remote mutation plus links from articles list and content shell.

name: 7A Show guest relationship management
description:
## Goal
Manage show<->guest links from admin show editor.

## Requirements
- Add guest search/autocomplete picker
- Add/remove guests linked to show (`showGuest`)
- Keep existing guest records and avoid duplicates

## Files (expected)
- show editor UI route(s)
- remote functions for guest query + attach/detach

## Acceptance Criteria
- Admin can add/remove guests on a show
- Guest links persist and reflect in public guest/show pages
result: Implemented show-guest relationship management in show editor with guest search, add/remove controls, diff-based persistence, and remote add_show_guest/remove_show_guest mutations.

name: Admin CMS Buildout (No Model Gaps)
description:
## Goal
Implement the requested CMS/admin capabilities only (excluding content model schema expansion).

## Scope Included
- 2A-2D content creation/editing + YouTube source-of-truth constraint
- 3A-3C publishing workflow (status, scheduling, preview)
- 4A tags admin + assignment
- 5A users/roles admin
- 7A-7C relationship management (guests, show-video, content-tags)
- 8 editor components
- 9 bulk operations
- 10 move validation/mutations to remote functions (not +page.server)
- 11 admin navigation fixes
- 12 search/filter/pagination improvements

## Explicitly Excluded
- Section 1 content model gaps (no schema expansion for that section)
- Section 6 media/asset management

## Done When
All scoped features are implemented in code, admin routes wired, and checks run (or failures documented if unrelated baseline issues).
result: Completed scoped CMS/admin buildout excluding content-model-gap schema work and media library scope. Delivered content creation shell/new flow, show notes editor overhaul, article editor, YouTube source-of-truth guardrails, status/scheduling/preview workflow, tags + users/roles admin, guest/video/content-tag relationship management, editor components, bulk status/tag/delete/export operations, remote-function-first mutations/validation, navigation updates, and content list search/filter/pagination.

name: 12 Search/filter/pagination improvements
description:
## Goal
Improve content list discoverability and scalability in admin.

## Requirements
- Add status filter
- Add content type filter
- Add date range filter
- Add pagination support instead of loading everything
- Keep filters combinable and reflected in query state

## Files (expected)
- `src/routes/(site)/admin/content/+page.svelte`
- related remote query module(s)

## Acceptance Criteria
- Large content sets are navigable with filters + pagination
- Filtered views behave predictably and performantly
result: Implemented content-list search/filter/pagination: text search, status filter, type filter, date range filters, and server-backed page navigation over list_content remote query.

name: 9D Content export
description:
## Goal
Export content data for backup/operator workflows.

## Requirements
- Export selected/all content as JSON (and CSV if quick)
- Respect current filters in export operation
- Implement via remote function/endpoint with auth checks

## Acceptance Criteria
- Admin can download filtered content export successfully
result: Implemented content export from filtered admin list via export_content remote command and client-side JSON download with generated filename.

name: 9B Bulk tag assignment
description:
## Goal
Assign/unassign tags to multiple content items at once.

## Requirements
- Multi-select content list rows
- Tag picker for add/remove in bulk
- Batch mutation returns success/failure counts

## Acceptance Criteria
- Operators can apply tags to many items quickly
result: Implemented bulk tag assignment/removal in admin content list with MultiSelect tag picker and batch assign_content_tags/remove_content_tags remote commands.

name: 7C Content-tag association management
description:
## Goal
Manage `content_tags` links inside content editors.

## Requirements
- Reusable tag assignment component for content wrappers
- Add/remove links in `content_tags`
- Keep UI synchronized with tag admin

## Acceptance Criteria
- Content entities have editable tag associations from admin editor
result: Implemented content-tag association management in content shell and show editor via MultiSelect plus assign_content_tags/remove_content_tags remote mutations and tag option queries.

name: 2B Show notes editor UI
description:
## Goal
Replace DB-dump style show admin page with a real show notes editor UX.

## Requirements
- Provide editor for `show.show_notes` with preview support
- Keep edit controls for content wrapper fields (title, slug, status, published_at)
- Keep/clean Spotify sync action but separate from editor actions
- Preserve markdown processing compatibility for public show page

## Files (expected)
- `src/routes/(site)/admin/content/podcast/[show_number]/+page.svelte`
- `src/routes/(site)/admin/content/podcast/admin_podcast.remote.ts`
- optional reusable components under `src/lib/admin/*`

## Acceptance Criteria
- Admin can edit show notes and save
- Saved notes appear in public show rendering
- Form UX has success/error feedback
result: Replaced podcast DB-dump page with full show editor UI at /admin/content/podcast/[show_number] including editable show notes (MarkdownEditor), metadata controls, save feedback, and preview entrypoint.

name: 3A Status transition UI
description:
## Goal
Add explicit publishing status controls across admin editors.

## Requirements
- Reusable status selector for DRAFT/PUBLISHED/ARCHIVED
- Add Publish, Unpublish, Archive actions in content/show/article editors
- Update list views to display current status consistently
- Implement via remote functions (no page-server mutation handlers)

## Files (expected)
- `src/lib/admin/StatusSelect.svelte`
- `src/routes/(site)/admin/content/**/*.svelte`
- remote modules under `src/routes/(site)/admin/**/**.remote.ts`

## Acceptance Criteria
- Operators can transition status without manual DB edits
- Status updates persist and are reflected in lists/details
result: Implemented status transition UI via reusable StatusSelect component and integrated status save flows into content/article/show editors with server-side persistence via remote functions.

name: 9C Bulk delete with confirmation
description:
## Goal
Allow destructive bulk delete with explicit confirmation safeguards.

## Requirements
- Multi-select rows
- Confirmation step requiring explicit acknowledgment
- Batch delete mutation with per-item result reporting

## Acceptance Criteria
- Deletions are intentional and auditable in UI feedback
result: Implemented bulk delete flow in admin content list with explicit DELETE confirmation guard and batch delete command that skips non-article content safely.

name: 3C Draft preview system
description:
## Goal
Allow previewing draft content safely before publishing.

## Requirements
- Add preview token/cookie mechanism for admin users
- Add preview routes or query mode for content by `content_id`
- Add Preview action in admin editors
- Keep preview protected from unauthenticated users

## Files (expected)
- preview route(s) under `src/routes`
- shared auth/preview checks in server logic
- editor UI actions in admin routes

## Acceptance Criteria
- Admin can open draft preview in new tab
- Non-admin/public cannot access unpublished preview without token
result: Implemented preview flow with /preview/[content_id] and /preview/clear endpoints, wired preview links from admin editors/list, and added preview-cookie check for future show access in show layout load.

name: 4A Tags admin + assignment
description:
## Goal
Implement tag administration and tag assignment flows.

## Requirements
- Add `/admin/tags` list with usage counts
- Add create/edit tag forms
- Add tag assignment UI in content/show/article editors
- Backed by remote functions for CRUD + assignment joins

## Files (expected)
- routes under `src/routes/(site)/admin/tags/*`
- remote module for tag operations in admin
- editor integration points in admin content routes

## Acceptance Criteria
- Tags can be created/updated from admin
- Tags can be assigned/unassigned from content editors
- Assigned tags appear in content listing context
result: Added tags admin at /admin/tags with list/create/update/delete, plus content/show tag assignment UIs using MultiSelect and remote content_tags mutations.

name: 5A Users + roles admin
description:
## Goal
Add user and role management screens for admin operations.

## Requirements
- Add `/admin/users` list
- Add `/admin/users/[id]` detail view
- Add role assignment controls (add/remove role)
- Add `/admin/roles` list/create if needed
- Use remote functions with explicit auth checks

## Files (expected)
- routes under `src/routes/(site)/admin/users/*` and `admin/roles/*`
- remote module(s) for user/role mutations

## Acceptance Criteria
- Admin can grant/revoke roles
- User list/search is usable for operator workflows
result: Added users and roles admin: /admin/users list, /admin/users/[user_id] detail role assignment/removal, /admin/roles list/create, with supporting remote functions for user/role CRUD links.

name: 8D Multi-select autocomplete component
description:
## Goal
Reusable multi-select input for guests, tags, and associations.

## Requirements
- Search-as-you-type dropdown
- Add/remove chips
- Keyboard navigation and selection
- Works with async remote option queries

## Files (expected)
- `src/lib/admin/MultiSelect.svelte`

## Acceptance Criteria
- Component is reusable across tags/guests/video association flows
result: Implemented multi-select autocomplete at src/lib/admin/MultiSelect.svelte with client-side filter, chip removal, dropdown selection, selected-id binding, and Escape-to-close interaction for guests/tags/associations.

name: 2A Create content flow
description:
## Goal
Add end-to-end content creation flow in admin.

## Requirements
- Add `/admin/content/new` route with content type picker (PODCAST, ARTICLE, VIDEO where applicable)
- Create content shell route `/admin/content/[content_id]` for shared fields: title, slug, type, status, published_at
- New items redirect into type-specific editor routes
- Use Svelte remote functions for create/update mutations

## Files (expected)
- `src/routes/(site)/admin/content/new/+page.svelte`
- `src/routes/(site)/admin/content/[content_id]/+page.svelte`
- `src/routes/(site)/admin/content/admin_content.remote.ts`

## Acceptance Criteria
- Admin can create new ARTICLE content and land in editor
- Slug/title/status/published_at save correctly
- Validation errors return actionable messages
result: Implemented create-content flow: added /admin/content/new UI, create_content remote command, and /admin/content/[content_id] shell route for shared metadata editing and navigation into type editors.

name: 9A Bulk status operations
description:
## Goal
Enable multi-select status updates in content list.

## Requirements
- Row selection controls
- Bulk action to set status (DRAFT/PUBLISHED/ARCHIVED)
- Batch remote mutation with clear results

## Acceptance Criteria
- Multiple selected rows can be transitioned in one operation
result: Implemented bulk status operations in admin content list with row selection, status target picker, and batch update via bulk_update_status remote command.
